solution_line_template: The total of candies is {green_candies} + {blue_candies} + {red_candies} = <<{green_candies}+{blue_candies}+{red_candies}={total_candies}>>{total_candies} candies.
The probability of a candy being blue is ({blue_candies}/{total_candies}) * {percentage_multiplier}% = {probability_blue_percentage}%.
